title: Number of Dollar Tree stores in Canada by province 2019
summary: In 2019 , Manitoba and the Saskatchewan were neck and with both province delivering Tree worth 107 and 102 million British pounds , respectively .
The stores of coming from the Alberta during this time was about half of this .
stores from British_Columbia and Ontario followed closely .
gold: As of February 2019 , Ontario was the Canadian province home to the most Dollar Tree stores in the whole of Canada , with 110.
British Columbia and Alberta ranked in second and third places , with 49 and 37 stores respectively.
At that time , there were Dollar Tree stores located in five of Canada 's ten provinces .
